  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 






Nightmare In 
      Napa

Saturday, April 21, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT
 
Two young women are murdered 
      on Halloween night in beautiful Napa, Calif.; a third roommate survives the 
      late-night attack. Police cast a wide net, testing the DNA of hundreds of 
      men, trying to find the killer.
 
What the victims' loved ones 
      didn’t realize is that the killer was among them – terrifyingly 
      close.
 

Correspondent Bill Lagattuta 
      reports for 
      48 Hours 
      Mystery, this Saturday, April 21, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT.
 
 
 
48 Hours producer Paul LaRosa, who has 
      followed this case for years, has written a book on the investigation 
      titled "Nightmare In Napa." Click 
      here to read an excerpt of the book.
 
The book, available April 24, 
      is published by Simon & Schuster's Pocket Books division. Simon & 
      Schuster, like CBS News and CBSNews.com, is a unit of CBS 
      Corp.
